column2: by means of what (instrument)?/by what?/with what?; pronoun/noun in the ablative without a preposition; by (means of), with;
in whose company/with whom is the action performed?; an ablative with the prepostion cum; with;
how/in what manner is the action performed?; an ablative (regularly an abstract noun) with the preposition cum; with;
with cardinal numerals (other than mīlia) the idea of the whole is expressed by ex or dē and the ablative

column1: Ablative of Time When or Within Which
column2: when or within which time did an action occur?; an ablative without a preposition; at, on, in, or within
column3: Ablative of Time When or Within Which

column2: shows the relationship of a part to the whole of which it is part; the thing that's the whole is in the genitive case
